attributes.action: Better equipment for our troops fighting in Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You cannot eat a meal properly without a knife and fork so how can our brave troops fighting in Afghanistan win the battle without better support from the government MOD for better equipment  more helicopters and protective battle clothing: mechanical bomb searching  devices; Bring out a lottery to use for our heroes and which will help the vast amount of injured that is not being mentioned. PLEASE DONT JUST IGNORE THIS SITUATION THAT IT WILL GO AWAY.
